page.title: 10CHILDRENS HOBBIES - BOYS
page.content: My name is Mark Marshall and my hobby is football. My favourite club is Doncaster Rovers, my best player is Alan Brown .I was the mascot for the Rovers when they beat Burnley 2-1.I am in the Junior Rovers Supporters Club. My name is Darren Dunhill.My hobby is playing the Side Drum. I've been on three marches with the band.After I have been playing with the band for a while I'll get invested. My name is Phillip Perkins.My hobby is breeding cats.I have three varieties of cats. A British Short Haired tipped worth Â£100.00, a Brown Burmese worth Â£70.00 and a Siamese worth Â£150.00. At home we have 12 kittens and 3 adult cats. My name is Adam Smith and I do Drama. Every Tuesday I go to a Drama Lesson, which lasts about two hours.I also do modelling for which you get paid.
